definition: to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: The child lived but had major medical problems including oxygen deprivation and bleeding in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 小孩存活了下来，但患有缺氧及脑出血等严重病症。

sentences.english: So in found that people with tonsillitis shall be timely treatment should be.
sentences.chinese: 因此在发现患有扁桃体炎时应及时予以治疗。

sentences.english: Along with being a risk factor for coronary artery disease, obesity may increase your risk of developing an arrhythmia.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖会增加患有冠心病的危险，由此导致心律失常。

sentences.english: We have a right to know if a potential partner has herpes.
sentences.chinese: 我们有权知道潜在的伴侣是否患有疱疹。

sentences.english: Tamitha, who had diabetes and ulcers, began to tremble.
sentences.chinese: 患有糖尿病和溃疡的塔米莎不禁冷得开始打颤。

sentences.english: During this time I was diagnosed with anticipatory anxiety disorder.
sentences.chinese: 就在那个时候，我被诊断出患有预想性焦虑失调症。

sentences.english: Anyone suspected of suffering from silicosis must be shifted to lighter work.
sentences.chinese: 谁要是怀疑患有矽肺，必须调做较轻的工作。

sentences.english: Methods 108 gynecological patients with chronic cervicitis were chosen.
sentences.chinese: 选择108例患有慢性宫颈炎的妇科病患者。

sentences.english: Announcing his resignation, Haarde said he had throat cancer.
sentences.chinese: 在宣布辞职的同时，Haarade称自己患有喉癌。

sentences.english: Anyone can get a hernia at any age.
sentences.chinese: 任何年龄的人都可以患有疝气。

sentences.english: Has the patient ever had the same or similar symptoms(s) before?
sentences.chinese: 就诊者以前曾否患有同类或类似病征？

sentences.english: Mr. Swayze's cancer was diagnosed in January 2008.
sentences.chinese: 斯威兹于2008年1月被诊断出患有胰腺癌。

sentences.english: In the US, hemodialysis is the most common treatment for people who have kidney failure.
sentences.chinese: 在美国血透是患有肾衰病人的最普遍的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Has your doctor ever told you that you have diabetic neuropathy? Yes No.
sentences.chinese: 你的医生诊断过你患有糖尿病神经病变吗？

sentences.english: In the Marshall Islands a third of all women have the condition.
sentences.chinese: 马绍尔群岛上三分之一的妇女都患有糖尿病。

sentences.english: One ofthe patients is a woman with epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 其中一个病人是一个患有羊癫疯的女性。

definition: to suffer (from an illness)/to fall ill
to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
